verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> further to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6213>"Make<s%> yourself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them; and you shall <S%H1961>use<s%> them for <S%H4744>summoning<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and for having the <S%H4264>camps<s%> <S%H4550>set<s%> out.

"And when <S%H1992>both<s%> are <S%H8628>blown,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H3259>gather<s%> themselves to you at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"Yet <S%H518>if<s%> [only] <S%H259>one<s%> is <S%H8628>blown,<s%> then the <S%H5387>leaders,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>divisions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H3259>assemble<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> you.
"But when you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm,<s%> the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that are <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H9506>side<s%> shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

"And when you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time,<s%> the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that are <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H8486>side<s%> shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out; an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> is to be <S%H8628>blown<s%> for them to <S%H4550>set<s%> out.
"When <S%H6950>convening<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> however, you shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H7321>sounding<s%> an <S%H7321>alarm.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priestly<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> moreover, shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%> and this shall be for you a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

"And <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> who <S%H6887>attacks<s%> you, then you shall <S%H7321>sound<s%> an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets,<s%> that you may be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from your <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

"Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and in your <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> and on the <S%H7218>first<s%> [days] of your <S%H2320>months,<s%> you shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and they shall be as a <S%H2146>reminder<s%> of you <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>lifted<s%> from <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%>

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out on their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%> Then the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>settled<s%> <S%H7931>down<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
So they <S%H5265>moved<s%> out for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7223>time<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H7223>first,<s%> with <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> its <S%H6635>army,<s%>
and <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar;<s%>
and <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

Then the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H3381>taken<s%> <S%H3381>down;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> who were <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

Next the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out with <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> its <S%H6635>army,<s%>
and <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%>
and <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad.<s%>

Then the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out, <S%H5375>carrying<s%> the <S%H4720>holy<s%> [objects;] and the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H6965>set<s%> up <S%H5704>before<s%> their <S%H935>arrival.<s%>

Next the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> was <S%H5265>set<s%> out, with <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> its <S%H6635>army,<s%>
and <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%>
and <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Then the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> [which formed] the <S%H622>rear<s%> <S%H622>guard<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>camps,<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out, with <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> its <S%H6635>army,<s%>
and <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher;<s%>
and <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4294>tribal<s%> <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
<S%H428>This<s%> was the <S%H4550>order<s%> of <S%H4550>march<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies<s%> as they <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2246>Hobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H4084>Midianite,<s%> Moses' father-in-law, "We are <S%H5265>setting<s%> out to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you'; <S%H1980>come<s%> with us and we will <S%H3190>do<s%> you <S%H3190>good,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
But he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I will not <S%H1980>come,<s%> but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> to my [own] <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H4138>relatives.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> do not <S%H5800>leave<s%> us, <S%H3588>inasmuch<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> as you <S%H3045>know<s%> where we should <S%H2583>camp<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and you will be as <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for us.

"So it will be, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H1980>go<s%> with us, it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H834>whatever<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3190>does<s%> for us, we will <S%H3190>do<s%> for you."

Thus they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey,<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5265>journeying<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them for the <S%H7969>three<s%> days, to <S%H8446>seek<s%> out a <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> for them.
And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> when they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Rise<s%> up, O <S%H3068>Lord!<s%> And let Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> And let those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Thee <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Thee."
And when it <S%H5117>came<s%> to <S%H5117>rest,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [To] the <S%H7233>myriad<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
